long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dropship Tracking Extension is for users wanting to convert their AMZL Tracking numbers to a different format that is acceptable by marketplaces. You can run the conversion for single tracking numbers or for all TBA numbers. It drastically speeds up the conversion and submission process.
